title: Analysis Summary of the Route
description: Parameters for the detailed summary analysis by analysis route id from OA. Endpoint - https://api.route4me.com/api/v1/analysis/route/{analyzed_route_id}

analyzed_route_id.title: Analyzed Route ID
analyzed_route_id.description: Analysis route id of the planned route - GET.

x-original-api-key.title: X Original Api key
x-original-api-key.description: Authorization by Route4Me key in the http request header, for Route4Me users - HEADER.

original_api_key.title: Original Api key
original_api_key.description: Authorization by Route4Me key, for Route4Me users - GET.

auth_token.title: Authentication Token
auth_token.description: Authorization token that will be given after signing in - GET.

show_business_summary.title: Show Business Summary
show_business_summary.description: Include business summary to report - GET.

api_key.title: Api key
api_key.description: Use API with API key without authorization. HTTP method - GET.

show_location_analysis_summary.title: Show Location Analysis Summary
show_location_analysis_summary.description: Include locations analysis summary to report - GET.

show_location_analysis.title: Show Location Analysis
show_location_analysis.description: Include locations analysis to report- GET.

x-auth-token.title: X Authentication Token
x-auth-token.description: Authorization token that will be given after signing in - HEADER.

x-api-key.title: X Api key
x-api-key.description: Use API with API key without authorization - HEADER.

show_detailed_routes_analysis.title: Show Detailed Routes Analysis
show_detailed_routes_analysis.description: Include detailed route analysis to report - GET.
